meanings.definition: A type of antelope found in Africa.
meanings.sent1: The bubales grazed peacefully in the savanna.
meanings.sent2: I saw a herd of bubales while on safari.
meanings.sent3: The bubales decided to have a race for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as graceful as a bubales in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The bubales' horns curved elegantly as they roamed.

meanings.definition: A type of wild goat found in Africa.
meanings.sent1: The bubales climbed the rocky cliffs with ease.
meanings.sent2: Local farmers warned about the mischievous bubales getting into crops.
meanings.sent3: The bubales played a game of hide-and-seek with the villagers.
meanings.sent4: The bubales' agility was unmatched in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The bubales' bleats echoed through the valley.
